Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
   fuu .eiÜ m;%h  www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka  nd.; l< yel'  
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs  
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2016 iema;eïn¾ 23 jeks Èk m< lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2016 iema;eïn¾ ui 09 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï 
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh bf,lafg%dksl 
iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
 î' fla' tia' rùkaø"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2016'09'02
1088  
ud,s.dlkao ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh
1894 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd×mkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokh
fuu wêlrKh bÈßfha wjika ù we;s jir mylg ^05& jvd mer‚ my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d 1894 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd 
f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd×mkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sfha úêúOdk m%ldrj fuu ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^3& bl=;a ùfuka 
miqj úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
   Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj, msgm;a fyda fjk;a Bg wÞ< f,aLk ,nd .ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;ka úiska fuu 
±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr tA i|yd b,a¨ï l< hq;= njg o lsishï kvq jd¾;djla úkdY fkdl< 
hq;= njg Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;af;l= isà kï fuu ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla bl=;a ùug fmr ;ud úiska u fyda 
kS;s{jrfhl= u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska idOdrK fya;= bÈßm;a lsÍug l%shd l< hq;= njg o fuhska ksfõokh 
lrkq ,efí'
 m%ikak w,aúia"
 ufyia;%d;a - ud,s.dlkao'
 
2016 wf.daia;= ui 04 jeks Èk"

   niakdysr m<df;a .ïmy Èia;%slalfha w¨;al=re fldarf<a j;a;, m%dfoaYSh iNd iSudj ;=< flrka.fmdl=K msysá

   niakdysr m<df;a .ïmy Èia;%slalfha w¨;al=re fldarf<a j;a;, m%dfoaYSh iNd iSudj ;=< flrka.fmdl=K msysá 
tï' ã' fÊ' ù' fmf¾rd n,h,;a ñkskafodare ;ek úiska idok ,o 1990'10'08 jeks Èk wxl 11728 ork msUqf¾ oelafjk                  
ojg.yl=Uqr hkqfjka y÷kajkq ,nk bvfï f,dÜ mS ork bvï lene,a,g udhsï" W;=rg ( len,s wxl N iy Q o" kef.
kysrg ( len,s wxl Q. R, S, iy T o" ol=Kg ( len,s wxl 02 ^wä 15 la m<, mdrla i|yd l, ìï ;Srh& o" niakdysrg (

hqla; ìï ;Srh m%fõY ud¾.hla f,i mj;ajdf.k hdfï whs;sjdislï fõ' fuu bvu .ïmy bvï ,shdmÈxÑ ld¾hd,fha 
c722$46 ys ,shdmÈxÑ lr we;'

by; wxl ork kvqfõ j¾I 2015la jQ uehs ui 22 jeks Èk we;=<;a lrk ,o iu: ;Skaÿ m%ldYh m%ldrj" by; kï lr 
we;s 1" 2" 3 ú;a;slrejka úiska meñ‚,slreg" remsh,a mkaish úismka,laI tfldf,diaoyia yhish odihl ^re' 5"25"11"616'00&

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2016'09'02
1116  
^re' 3"33"000& ne.ska o" b;sß jdßl 48 jdßlhla remsh,a oi,laI oioyia y;aish y;,sia folla ^re' 1"010"742'00& ne.ska o 
jYfhka uq¨ jdßl 60lska f.jd ksu lsÍug 1 jeks" 2 jeks iy 3 jeks ú;a;slrejka tlÕjqk njg wKfldg ;Skaÿ m%ldY
